alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 9:08AM CST until December 26 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. Chambers Creek Near Rice affecting Navarro County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Minor flooding of farm and ranch land is expected near the river. A few rural roads will be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 27.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 31.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
